page.title: 04Tourism in our area.
page.content: The Gower coast is an area of great natural beauty,people flock to the beaches every summer.Most of them stay in caravans,chalets,hotels or a just day trippers. There are lots of interesting things to do such as climbing,walking, swimming,caving,water-skiing,surfing and hang-gliding.These are some of the many outdoor sports activities that you can join in,there are also many gentler pursuits.You can visit one of the many castles and churches that are in the area.Some fine examples of these are found at Oystermouth,Penrice and Pennard. At Cefn Bryn you can take a walk and see King Arthurs'Stone,another relic to strengthen the claim of Wales to the ancient legend. We are very lucky to live so near to this area of natural leisure.
